summary: This is an email from December 18, 2007, regarding the shipment of a box containing correspondence and evidence related to the negotiation of an agreement in the Epstein case. The sender notes writing 'Urgent' on the box to expedite delivery.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney
persons.context: The recipient of the urgent box containing correspondence and evidence related to the negotiation of an agreement in the Epstein case.

events.title: Shipment of Epstein Evidence and Correspondence
events.description: A box containing correspondence and evidence related to the negotiation of an agreement in the Epstein case is sent to the Assistant U.S. Attorney, marked 'Urgent'.

keyFacts: On December 18, 2007, correspondence and evidence related to the negotiation of an agreement in the Epstein case were shipped.
The shipment was marked 'Urgent' to expedite delivery to the Assistant U.S. Attorney.
The document indicates active legal proceedings and evidence handling in the Epstein case in late 2007.
